metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16942 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind2.0.0 through 2.9.10. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally orfor a specific property) for an externally exposed JSON endpoint and theservice has the commons-dbcp (1.4) jar in the classpath, and an attackercan find an RMI service endpoint to access, it is possible to make theservice execute a malicious payload. This issue exists because oforg.apache.commons.dbcp.datasources.SharedPoolDataSource andorg.apache.commons.dbcp.datasources.PerUserPoolDataSource mishandling.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
